scripts.test: cd auto_test && mocha reset_all.js --timeout 50000 && mocha order_management.js --timeout 50000 && mocha primary-shipment-plan.js --timeout 50000 && mocha secondary-shipment-plan.js --timeout 50000 && mocha assign-loading-bay.js --timeout 50000 && mocha associate-rollcage.js --timeout 50000 && mocha inbound.js --timeout 50000 && mocha putaway.js --timeout 50000 && mocha sort.js --timeout 50000 && mocha outbound.js --timeout 50000 && mocha loading.js --timeout 50000
scripts.item_movement: cd auto_test && mocha reset_item_movement.js --timeout 50000 && mocha inbound.js --timeout 50000 && mocha putaway.js --timeout 50000 && mocha sort.js --timeout 200000 && mocha outbound.js --timeout 50000 && mocha loading.js --timeout 50000
scripts.inbound: cd auto_test && mocha reset_item_movement.js --timeout 50000 && mocha inbound.js --timeout 50000
scripts.om: cd auto_test && mocha reset_all.js --timeout 50000 && mocha order_management.js --timeout 50000
scripts.rp: cd auto_test && mocha primary-shipment-plan.js --timeout 50000 && mocha secondary-shipment-plan.js --timeout 50000 && mocha assign-loading-bay.js --timeout 50000
